tool_description: How to get the price of the main cryptocurrencies via an API
name: cryptocurrency market
title: cryptocurrency market

api_list.name: crypto
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cryptocurrency-market.p.rapidapi.com/api/crypto"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cryptocurrency-market.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://cryptocurrency-market.p.rapidapi.com/api/crypto"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cryptocurrency-market.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
